value.title: StarCraft 2 - How Quickly Can SCARLETT Dispose Of Noobs? | Holdout Challenge
value.excerpt: We paid Scarlett to 1v1 noobs. The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match as long as possible. Scarlett unleashed her cheesy plays to stop the clock. This Holdout Challenge was a part of  PiG Sty Festival 2021 https://www.pigstarcraft.com/about/pig-sty-festival/  üê∑ https://www.patreon.com/PiGSC2
